text: @JoeBiden Trump “THE CHUMP” aka “Pinocchio” IS TOO STUPID to face the facts right in front of him!  He doesn’t care at all about anyone who catches this HORRIBLE Coronavirus OR who dies from it!  He’s a HORRIBLE human being AND he’s NOT even worthy of being called human!  LOVES HIMSELF!!!!
